page.title: 19HOUSING
page.content: {(SUNDON PARK AND MARSH FARM ESTATES {CONTINUED)}Private houses are either detached or semi's. Most council houses were built in the late 60's,early 70's, but some in the late 70's early 80's.Private houses were built around the mid 70's. In the council estates there are small open spaces and concrete play areas which had been slightly vandalised.Larger open spaces are found in the private areas. Private houses have larger gardens than council houses. Buses only pass through council house areas. Council houses have garages in mass blocks,whilst private houses have them joined to the house. The area in the North of Luton and to the west of the A1 is only now being built upon.The new estate of Barton Hills is currently under construction.
